title: iAtkos M (MacOS 10.9.1 Mavericks)
description:
Mac OS X:
- Insert a USB flash/hdd (minimum 8GB in size) and erase it with Disk Utility using any format. (You can also rename)
- Double click "Restore_M_to_USB.pkg", select the USB flash/hdd you erased as target and click install.
It will restore the iATKOS M dmg image to your USB device. It can take up to 200 minutes according to your hardware.

Windows:
- Use Transmac to restore the iATKOS M dmg file to your USB device. It will also take long to finish the restore operation, raw write to USB takes long on any platform.

I advice you to use a USB3 device/port, mine restores in 5 minutes.

cheers

uphuck
